text:
I am developing the Marketplace app, but I am having an issue with multiple client concepts. I want to use the Access token for API request calls.
I am storing code, access_token and refresh token in the database, but I am not getting any details about which account is connected with these access tokens.

I need some guidelines to help me set up this oAuth integration.

Does anyone have experience developing market place app and connect it with cloud server?
